Factsheet

Developer:
Yannis ATTARD
Based in France
Release date:

Windows
Website:
yberry.itch.io/lovelovegod
Regular Price:
Free

Description

Love LoveGod is a two player brawler, where you win by sending flowers to the LoveGod, watching you from the top of the arena

History

This game was made with Unity, during the ENJAM 2016, an intern jam for ENJMIN students. We were two programmers on the project. It was my first time on Unity, and I made the character controller.

Features

  • Unity
  • 2D character controller
